amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to develop a means to track and monitor information on debts of persons to the United States by virtue of the persons' participation in a benefits program administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, including because of an overpayment by the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2934 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2934 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4335) To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to develop a means to track and monitor information on debts of persons to the United States by virtue of the persons' participation in a benefits program administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, including because of an overpayment by the Department of Veterans Affairs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2934 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2934 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2910.
